prompt: An infectious afrobeat groove with hand-played congas and shakers weaving a complex three-against-two polyrhythmic pattern. A syncopated clean electric guitar riff dances over a deep steady bassline. The rhythm is layered and intricate, with overlapping accents creating a mesmerizing cross-rhythm feel. Instrumental, no vocals.

prompt_fields.control_delta: Rhythm: add 3:2 polyrhythmic percussion layer (same tempo/key)
